author: dlr
msg: If the system clock is set back at any point while your app is running, and an object is created before the "original" time, the "timeLapse" value would be negative, which would make the "clever quantity" negative.

author: dlr
msg: Here is a patch that simply changes the initial value for the modified
field in the torque org.apache.torque.om.BaseObject to true.

author: jmcnally
msg: only throw the exception in the event the keyGenerator should not be null.

author: jmcnally
msg: remove redundant modifiers as per Peter Donald's patch.
